00025 // HISTORY:
00026 //   1 Apr 1999 - changed it so that a flag without an = sign is
00027 //                automatically set to 0 (so its presence can be tested) 
00028 //  29 Jun 1999 - added getFile( int ) method
00029 //   3 Nov 2004 - updated this to use STL instead of Jo Perry's utilities.
00030 
00031 #ifndef CMDLINE_H
00032 #define CMDLINE_H
00033 
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 #include<string>
00037 #include<vector>
00038 #include<map>
00039 #include<set>
00040 
00041 typedef map< string, string, less< string > > string_table;
00042 typedef vector< string > string_list;
00043 typedef set< string > string_set;
00044 
00058 
00059 class CmdLine {
00060 public:
00067   CmdLine( int argc, char * * argv );
00068 
00069   ~CmdLine();                   // clean up allocated memory
00070 
00072   bool flagsAreLegal( const string_set legal_flags ) const;
00073 
00075   unsigned numberOfFiles() const;
00076 
00078   string_list getFiles() const;
00079 
00083   const string getFile( unsigned i );
00084 
00086   bool flagPresent( const string flag ) const;
00087 
00089   const string stringFlag( const string flag ) const;
00090 
00093   int intFlag( const string flag ) const;
00094 
00098   double doubleFlag( const string flag ) const;
00099 
00102   bool boolFlag( const string flag ) const;
00103 
00104 private:
00105   string_list my_files;
00106   string_table my_flags;
00107 };
00108 
00109 #endif
